keyword: calories in a blueberry muffin from costco
title: Calories in a Costco Blueberry Muffin
meta_description: Discover calories in a blueberry muffin from Costco—about 680 kcal per large muffin—plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, and tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in a Costco Blueberry Muffin
assumptions: Large Costco bakery blueberry muffin (~200 g), baked with flour, sugar, blueberries, eggs, oil/butter, no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, size, ingredients, and store location. Check Costco packaging or app for exact values when available.

quick_answer.text: A Costco blueberry muffin contains about 680 kcal, with high carbs from sugar and flour.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 pat of butter on top

faqs.q: How many calories in a blueberry muffin from Costco?
faqs.a: Approximately 680 kcal for one large muffin.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Costco blueberry muffin?
faqs.a: About 92 g total carbs, including 52 g sugars and 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a Costco blueberry muffin high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 30 g total fat per muffin, with 5 g saturated.

faqs.q: How much protein in a Costco blueberry muffin?
Does size affect calories in Costco muffins?
faqs.a: Yes, Costco's are oversized; smaller muffins may have 300-400 kcal.
